relayMessage(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Make sure this is only called by privileged accounts.

params.from: The address of the sender of the message.
params.nonce: The nonce of the message to avoid replay attack.
params.to: The address of the recipient of the message.
params.value: The msg.value passed to the message call.

params.gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the message relay on corresponding chain.
params.target: The address of account who receive the message.
params.value: The amount of ether passed when call target contract.

params.gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the message relay on corresponding chain.
params.refundAddress: The address of account who will receive the refunded fee.
params.target: The address of account who receive the message.
params.value: The amount of ether passed when call target contract.

sendMessage(address,uint256,bytes,uint25.notice: Send cross chain message from L1 to L2 or L2 to L1.
Send cross chain message from L1 to L2 or L2 to L1.

xDomainMessageSender().notice: Return the sender of a cross domain message.
